text: Titli is a popular Indian television series. which was telecast on Star Jalsa from 13th July 2020. Madhupriya Chowdhury, Aryan Bhowmik played the lead roles. == Cast == * Madhupriya Chowdhury as Titli Bose * Aryan Bhowmick as Sunny Bose * Ayendri Lavenia Roy as Rehana Mitra aka Rahi * Maitrayee Mitra as Rekha Bose * Shankar Chakraborty as Anup Sanyal * Anindya Chakraborty as Debasish * Susovan Sonu Roy as Hotel person == References == Category:2020 Indian television series debuts
title: Titli (TV series)
